Today at 8pm KST, BLACKPINK went down in history as the 1st K-Pop Group to surpass 1 Billion views on YouTube with their ‚ÄúDDU-DU DDU-DU‚Äù MV!
‚ÄúDDU-DU DDU-DU‚Äù dropped on June 15, 2018, at 6 p.m, and took just under 17 months to reach the 1 billion mark.[Spoil] ‡∏Ñ‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏π‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ã‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ß‡πâPSY¬†is¬†the¬†only¬†other¬†Korean¬†act¬†to¬†have¬†reached¬†the¬†milestone¬†with¬†both¬†‚ÄúGangnam¬†Style‚Äù¬†and¬†‚ÄúGentleman.‚Äù¬†The¬†video¬†is¬†the¬†fastest¬†and¬†1st¬†music¬†video¬†by¬†a¬†K-pop¬†group¬†to¬†reach¬†900¬†million¬†views,¬†and¬†the¬†most-viewed¬†music¬†video¬†by¬†a¬†K-pop¬†group¬†on¬†YouTube.

"Ddu-Du Ddu-Du" is the lead single from BLACKPINK's debut EP 'Square Up'. The song topped the Gaon weekly Digital Chart for 4 weeks, and was certified platinum by Gaon, for over 2,500,000 certified downloads in march 2019 and over 100,000,000 streams in November 2018.

The song was certified gold by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) on August 22, 2019, for 500,000 equivalent units.

The single has sold 1.2 million units in America so far, and 11 million units worldwide! It's also BLACKPINK's best-selling single in China, having sold 3 million units!

The single also garnered over 220 million streams on Spotify. As of October 22, 2019, the song has already surpassed 1.75 billion streams worldwide across all official YouTube channels and on Spotify!
